body.p:
Louisville 15th Octr 1862
To His Excellancy the Governor of Ky
Sir

Enclosed please find a recommendation of the Jury in the case of the Commonwealth vs Michael Fishback Jr. William Fishback & John Fishback recommending the two younger ones to wit William & John to Executive clemancy assigning as a reason that I am a poor man & will have to pay the fine for them as they are minors. The Statements are true if your Excellancy does not interpose it will be quite a Serious Matter with me as to my other son Michael Fishback Jr he is illy able to pay the amount assessed against him. Should your Excellancy be disposed to interpose I will ask you to be so kind as to address your answer to me at Jeffersontown, Jefferson Co Ky which is my post office. Hoping your Excellancy will be moved in this matter ^by the recommendation^ as in duty bound I will ever pray
P. S. J. B. Briscoe the magistrate whose name is signed to the enclosed is the magistrate before whom the case was tried.
